New Records: Draymond Green recorded five blocks, four of which on Zion Williamson, who was held to a career-worst 25% field goal percentage
Key Match Events: Draymond Green's five blocks included four on Williamson and a key block on Brandon Ingram's three-pointer
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Kerr praised Green's defensive performance and leadership
Draymond Green expressed his motivation to be recognized among the league's top defenders
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors have the second-best defensive rating in the league (98.4)
The Warriors are committed to defense with Green anchoring their defensive efforts
